personalInfo.name: Misbah ul Haque
personalInfo.title: Experienced Android Developer
personalInfo.subtitle: Innovative Android Developer with 2+ years of experience in creating user-centric mobile and Android TV applications. Proficient in Kotlin and Jetpack Compose, delivering high-quality solutions that elevate user engagement.

experience.title: Software Development Engineer II - Android
achievements: Optimised app startup time by 60% leveraging Content Provider and Android Startup Library
Implemented Contextual Continue Watching, reducing API response times by 6 seconds
Maintained 99.9% crash-free rate during high-concurrency events with 50M+ users
Upgraded analytics and impression tracking for better performance insights

experience.title: Software Development Engineer I - Android
achievements: Led Android TV Player Skin redesign achieving 40% reduction in rendering time
Built Login with QR Code functionality using MVVM architecture
Maintained 99.6% crash-free rate during FIFA World Cup 2022 and IPL 2023
Played critical role in optimizing app performance for high-traffic events

projects.title: JioCinema Player Skin
projects.description: Complete Android TV player interface redesign with 40% faster rendering, custom controls, and seamless playback for millions of users.

projects.title: QR Code Login System
projects.description: Secure authentication system allowing users to login via QR code scan, with custom OTP views and MVVM architecture.

projects.title: Tetris Game
projects.description: Fully functional Tetris game using Jetpack Compose with real-time game mechanics, collision detection, and scoring system.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: Dynamic weather application with custom calculator, real-time data from OpenWeather API, and theme changes based on conditions.
